website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-use pouches for parents that want high-nutrient baby food on the go.
pros: Only uses organic produce for health and safety
Interesting flavor blends that babies and toddlers enjoy
cons: Some babies do not like the flavor and texture of chia

customer_reviews.title: Food packets not packaged in company marked box
customer_reviews.text: The food packets did not come in a company marked boxed. Instead, the packets were loosely packaged in a brown shipping box. Unfortunately, I couldn't in good conscience give this to my infant.
customer_reviews.author: Shopperspree

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old daughter has been eating this flavor ...
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter has been eating this flavor of Happytot pouches for the past five years. We buy them by the case, every month. This month, my daughter refuses to eat them anymore. She said they taste "sour". I sampled them myself and can confirm that the taste has definitely changed, with no warning or notice on the package. Extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AV38

customer_reviews.title: Snack on the run
customer_reviews.text: Needed a quick snack that's support my body. I don't have time to sit and eat all day long. I use to not eat all day and then eat something late. Being organic, helps supply protein and needed vegetables. Very easy to take along and eat in a couple minutes. I love the combinations and they taste great. Not just for babies!
customer_reviews.author: MsRef

customer_reviews.title: these are big pouches for my big toddler :)
customer_reviews.text: These seem huge at 4.22 oz. my son is a good eater and sometimes can't finish one, but luckily we can put the top back on and pop them in the fridge. I LOVE the packaging on these. There are no surprises about what the food inside looks like. These are great when we are out and about, or as a veggie boost to a fruit-heavy meal (that could just be a personal issue lol) Overall, these are awesome. If they go on sale again (I paid $14.99-lighting deal), I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: MaryWHicks13

customer_reviews.title: Changing the package
customer_reviews.text: My son (special needs child) ate the mango one a lot the past few years, however, our last batch they change to package it came in. The package now has a clear area for you to see the color of the food but for my son seeing it this makes him not want to eat it anymore. He is a picky eater and I can’t get him to eat fruits and veggies except banana, apple and carrots. I was happy enough for him eating these pouches however now I will have to stop buying them. I am bummed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Maddock

customer_reviews.title: 22 month old still loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves these from 9 months old to now almost 2yo. They are great for outings when he's simply too busy to stop and eat but i still want to ensure he's getting liquids/nutrition(i.e. a party, the park, the beach). I always keep one in the diaper bag. Yes, they do have a significant amount of natural sugar but also have other vitamins/minerals. He's starting to get his 2yo molars and uncomfortable mouth/not eating much so I'll get in him what i can, when i can. He eats 3-5/week. Price is good, a little cheaper than local.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED MOLDY
customer_reviews.text: Yes, that is black mold growing out of a busted pouch received in rancid condition. Absolutely disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Dagny Taggart

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We have been being these on subscribe and save for almost 3 years. I think they are a great way to sneak in fruits and vegetables! Our kids love all the flavors and I know these help make sure I Can give them everything they need. They are wayyyyy cheaper on subscribe and save than in store, almost half price when you buy so many baby items per month on subscribe and save
customer_reviews.author: MCMD410

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old son won’t eat vegetables. He refuses to eat any. So my husband and I decided to look for these and we started giving him 2 pouches a day. He likes eating it but won’t do it on his own (lazy I know) so in order for me to know she ate it all I have to give it to him. I actually taste some of them while giving it to him and it does have a good taste.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Had to toss one pouch - others are fine.
customer_reviews.text: Love these pouches but one pouch was damaged and leaked (it looks like maybe caught in the box it came in?) and we had to toss it. I’d rather buy these in store now because the lost pouch completely negates any cost savings over buying in person, where I get to inspect before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: MBlum

customer_reviews.title: Big help
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. They are great for his picky toddler days when he wont eat anything but carbs I know he is still getting some veggies and fruits. Took these with us on a 24 Hr road trip and a cruise. Was a great help when away from home
customer_reviews.author: MissMega

customer_reviews.title: I've had these on S&S for 6 years!  Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this on subscribe & save for 6 years! I am happy that the company have changed the design of the caps slightly to allow kids to open them easier. My daughter is almost 6 and used to have to have the teacher open these at lunch everyday, but not anymore YAY! These are an everyday staple in my kids lunch. I am very happy with the product. I love that they're BPA free and organic. My daughter likes them a lot too. I have never received a bad pouch or experienced any leaks. I will always continue to buy these on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Taste awful
customer_reviews.text: The package was sturdy, the see through part was helpful but these things taste awful! All four flavors awful , I'm not sure If they went bad or that all four flavors really taste this bad. Im not sure how these received such high reviews
customer_reviews.author: Kez-G.

customer_reviews.title: One unHappy Baby
customer_reviews.text: Baby does not seem to like the texture that chia adds. He'll eat about 1/2 of it if he is really hungry but quickly rejects it for other foods. Tried a number of flavors at different times. All are received (rejected) with the same reaction. Trying the "same" flavors without the chia added and he finishes the entire pouch without an issue. Love the convenience of pouch eating and wanted to extend it even as he readily accepts more solid food with pouches that offer higher fiber and nutrition. For my baby, this product does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Owl Gram

customer_reviews.title: low sugar content
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 12month old, and I am so please how low sugar and pure they are. No additives, no sugars, just the real fruits or veggies! One of the pouches has chia as well! I even like the way they taste and have had a few for myself. We will be keeping these in stock from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren McEndree

customer_reviews.title: My toddler won't eat it
customer_reviews.text: We love the "Happy Tot" brand but this Apples, Spinach, Peas, & Broccoli flavor leaves much to be desired. My toddler won't eat it! I don't have a picky child either so that says a lot. I regret not buying a variety pack because now I have to find different ways to use up all SIXTEEN of these nasty food packs.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Great on the go
customer_reviews.text: It felt great giving my child this healthier option. He really seemed to enjoy the taste except for the green one but when he got a little older he ended up eating them. They were a little more expensive compared to other pouches, but I felt like these were the best middle ground in healthiness, taste, and price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley19

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Variety Pack
customer_reviews.text: Well I didn't appreciate that the "Variety Pack" option arrived loose in the box (no packaging) and the 'pears, peas and green beans' flavor is the old style pouch (no window) and 2 weeks away from their expiration date! Not very happy and won't be ordering the "Variety Pack" again... Issues with the seller aside, these are a great product and my daughter loves nearly every flavor she's tried.
customer_reviews.author: Tonkzilla

customer_reviews.title: Good for a travel snack.
customer_reviews.text: Love , love, love this product... My 1 year old son that is. We bring these along when we are traveling as snacks NOT as meal replacement... they hold him over till we can eat proper food. My only issue is that they are a little sweet (which is prob why my son loves them so). I've tried them and essentially they are the consistency of apple sauce.
customer_reviews.author: SMSPlace

customer_reviews.title: Mold?
customer_reviews.text: Second time ordering this. The first order was perfect. This order I found a pouch with MOLD!!! I will not risk any of the others. U fortunately this item isn’t refundable? WHY? Waste of money on a brand and item we love
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Molina

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to carry around in the diaper-bag for a quick snack my kid loves them. They arrived quickly. I had ordered some from a different brand it was in their proper package, when i got these I was surprised they seemed to just be tossed in a box. Which is not a big deal I just found it odd that it did not seem to be in their original package.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: We will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old loves these they were great on the beach and nice to have in the bottom of the diaper bag when you have a hangry baby and nothing to feed him! He liked all flavors equally, we will buy again. I personally didn’t like the flavor, but baby food is not made for adults to like. As long as he likes it I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Claire W.

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Approved
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves these and I feel good about the ingredients. I always have one in my diaper bag for when we are out and about. He can eat these anytime, anywhere without making a mess. Mom win!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Lu

customer_reviews.title: My little guy loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My ten month old is a fussy eater but he -loves- this stuff! His favorite thing is anything with cinnamon, so finding apples, carrots and sweet potatoes all with that cinnamon flavor was wonderful! He ate a full serving of this, and the value can't be beat. So easy to grab a bag and go out the door with it too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toddler doesn't like chia
customer_reviews.text: My daughter refuses to eat these pouches. She loves Plum and just about any other pouch but this one. I think its the chia. I should have bought a single pouch to try from grocery store before buying entire case on amazon. I was able to sneak a few in smoothies before giving box away to a less pickey toddler.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: Yummy, organic, and perfect for traveling or on the go. I even caught myself hiding in the pantry and eating a few of these! They were great for me for breakfast, just saying. So good and great for kiddos, and best of all for our family - DAIRY FREE!
customer_reviews.author: Three Little Kittens

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter doesn’t eat by mouth so I don’t know how they taste. But quality, calorie content and a great price is why I use these daily. I like the see through pouch. And I’ve never had an issue with anything bad with these
customer_reviews.author: Heather Price

customer_reviews.title: I love the variety this company has so my toddler doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have always had a picky eater and we're afraid that she wouldn't get all her nutrients, plus she's very constipated. I get this type of food which I give her one pouch for every meal she has. I mix a pouch with yogurt to give her in the morning and at night. I love the variety this company has so my toddler doesn't get bored, consumes all the necessary nutrients, and gets all the fiber she needs.
customer_reviews.author: Emma M. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. 1 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: It's so nutritious and my 1 year old loves it. And if the child is constipated, it really helps them go, like within an hour. (You know it happens once in a while...) Very good product at great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty18

customer_reviews.title: The only way my son eats veggies
customer_reviews.text: My son is a picky eater and refuses to eat vegetables, which makes it difficult to get the proper nutrition he needs. He LOVES these pouches, however. They have to be cold though, lol. I don’t mind spending the money for a great tasting way to get my son to eat veggies and fruit he otherwise doesn’t eat.
customer_reviews.author: Illi U

customer_reviews.title: Great on the go for picky snackers
customer_reviews.text: My toddler refuses to eat fruits and veggies, but he loves sucking down these pouches! I feel good to be able to give him a few servings a day by offering these and knowing they’re organic. Most of the flavors taste ok and there’s only a few he won’t eat. The Plum brand tastes better in my opinion. They’re great on the go too because they don’t need to be refrigerated.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Almost expired!
customer_reviews.text: Expires in less than 2 months! Usually expiration is a year away. Old product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maryion

customer_reviews.title: Happy Tot & Easy Travels
customer_reviews.text: My little one enjoys these squeezy packs. The flavors are good. They arrive in a sturdy box, which makes them easy to store. They are great for quick snacks on the go. Appreciate that there are options without banana, especially for travel days when these squeezy packs are consumed in larger quantities than usual. Recommended without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: ActiveMom

customer_reviews.title: On the run!
customer_reviews.text: I use these on ultraruns as 'real food' instead of gels. They taste great, and make my stomach less sick than a syrupy Gell when it gets hot. Who says only babies get to enjoy this!
customer_reviews.author: Honey Badger

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and I like how the ingredient label reads. Having organic food for my toddler is important to me. I also like seeing chia seeds in them to add fiber and extra nutrients. It also makes it heartier in my opinion. She liked all four also.
customer_reviews.author: Texaschick2005

customer_reviews.title: Toddlers not crazy about taste
customer_reviews.text: My infant and toddlers will both eat anything, but when they tried these neither would continue eating. They said yuck and shook their head no. Since I purchase via subscribe and save, I have 2 boxes of packets. I used the packets in a recipe I found online for spinach muffins and used in place of spinach. I also added food coloring and called them "green monster muffins" my toddlers enjoyed them but they certainly had a strange taste. If your toddler likes the ingredients then I recommend otherwise ili would only purchase one packet to have child try as to not waste money on something they may not like.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey O.

customer_reviews.title: Love the HappyTot Organic pouches- tasty and HEALTHY!
customer_reviews.text: These organic pouches sell out FAST at the store, and with good reason! We love these fruit pouches-- they are portable, sized perfectly for kiddo hands, and offer a perfect, wholesome snack. Ingredients are organics and gives a healthy dose of omega-3. All organic with 100% natural ingredients, no pesticides, no chemical fertilizers, no genetic modifications, and no preservatives. The pouches themselves are are BPA and phthalate free. Compare the ingredient list on these snacks to the other fruit pouches and you will quickly see why these are so popular: Contains: Organic Banana, Organic Peach, Organic Mango, Salba That's it! Simple, pure, and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: sassymom

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get the right products
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered these many of times and this is the first time I’ve had this issue. The products that are listed that you are buying are great. I guess we will give these others shot but I’m disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: jcd

customer_reviews.title: Gritty texture, okay flavor, convenient packaging
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is fine and the flavor is okay, the texture has my tot not wanting to eat them. We are having to mix with yogurt. They are very gritty in texture.
customer_reviews.author: crystal anne liberatore

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been eating these Happy Tot Organics since he was around 6mos old. He absolutely LOVES it. I bought this and the banana, peach & mango combo. I love that they're organic, contain chia seeds, and in pouches. Very convenient for on the go feeding. I mix these with veggies sometimes, oatmeal, brown rice, etc etc. Its perfect and will purchase again. I absolutely LOVE Happy Baby brand!
customer_reviews.author: Fatima84

customer_reviews.title: Check expiration dates- some are soon, but still a great value!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME for the price but make sure to check the expiration dates- each blend is different. No biggie- just make sure to use in order of expiration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this flavor is a flop
customer_reviews.text: I am the only one in my family who can stand this flavor, so it falls upon me to eat them. My girls LOVE "squeezy fruits" but they each took one sip of this and gave it back to me. My husband tried it and he said it makes him ill. I don't mind it, but I won't buy them again, and I'll be glad when they're gone. It feels like a waste of money. The texture is a little strange, and the spinach aftertaste might be what turned them off. YMMV
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and nutritious
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is very particular about these and won’t eat them. They are so much better than most other brands so I’m really disappointed. I would still recommend if your kid isn’t particular about pouches.
customer_reviews.author: gretchen moeller

customer_reviews.title: Love all Happy Tot!
customer_reviews.text: We love all the Happy Tot pouches! We have a 3 year old and a 15 month old who either leave most green veggies untouched or tossed on the floor (the 15m handles them this way). We've taken to making natural smoothies but both boys still get one of these as their "bedtime snack". They provide the green veggies they need, the fiber, taste great AND the boys see them as I big treat! And mommy feels good that they are getting a good healthy snack without anything they don't need...
customer_reviews.author: MPetro

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go
customer_reviews.text: I love these pouches because they fit nicely in my diaper bag, won't crack as a jar of baby food would if dropped, and my son loves the fact that it's in a pouch. Food does cost more in the pouch than in a jar, and I wish I could just refill the pouch with food, but you can't. My son seems to like all flavors of this brand except the all vegetable ones. If you'd like more tips about must have baby registry items, what to expect in your first year of motherhood, and even what recovery after delivery might look like, visit the website, AllMomsArePerfect.com.
customer_reviews.author: PuddlethePoodle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Happy Baby!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is now 2 and we have been buying Happy Baby product from Amazon since she was 6 months old. They almost always have the best price and best selection! These are the best portable snack for a active toddler! My daughter loves the taste and I love that it is a healthy snack. A added benefit I have found is that the extra fiber helps keep her digestive track in check. She has had constipation problems since around a year and these have been the key to keeping her comfortable. For the best price Join Amazon Mom and subscribe and save. Lifesaver for those of us who live in Very rural communities!
customer_reviews.author: Bretzhome

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: My kids really enjoy them, and they are nice, healthy snacks. They are pricey, but I feel better knowing they are getting at least some fruits and veggies during the day.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Some Inedible Flavors
customer_reviews.text: My daughter refuses to eat 3/4 of these flavors and after tasting them, I know why. The ones with veggies have overwhelming veggie flavors; so they'd be great if that's what you're looking for. I'm trying to get veggies into my baby without a huge fight.
customer_reviews.author: Micahlyn Vaage

customer_reviews.title: Excellent on the go organic option for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Excellent on the go organic option for all ages. The youngest person in my family is 22 and I send these off with the kids to keep in their apartments for a healthy option when they have no time to make our usual organic smoothies from fresh/frozen food. We like them straight out of the pouch but a couple in a blend with ice makes a fast, healthy smoothie! Buying in packs with the Subscribe and Save keeps these to around $1 each making it way less expensive than buying off the shelves individually.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it, so I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is really great to find convenient baby food (squeeze packs are so easy once the baby can hold them) that isn't just a bunch of sugar. It seems like a lot of the squeeze packs are just fruit juice with a little bit of substance to thicken it. I love that this is a snack that is more balanced (it has protein and fiber from the Chia seeds and iron from the spinach) so it stays with the baby for longer. I haven't tried the other flavors yet since baby has liked this one so much. I have tried the Greek yogurt ones and those were also a hit, although they do have more sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on the go food
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a must have for moms. I always keep a couple in the car, my purse, and at home. I dont need spoons or refrigeration (unless opened). I have this product on the subscribe and save because I use it so much. My baby started drinking these when he was 6 months old and he's almost 11 months now. Now that my baby is getting older he is able to hold it by himself although that is a little messy while he learns. My 2 year old often drink one of these as well. Sometimes my 4 year old will have one too! Such an easy way to get extra fruits and vegetables in.
customer_reviews.author: Cjmoura

customer_reviews.title: Best before: 02/12/18 😕
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered and received this package yesterday. Pulled it out to check the date and realize my little on has a couple weeks to munch these down to make it before the “best before” date. Otherwise the flavor is enjoyed and overall I really like the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My little one loves them
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't call my 2 year old a picky eater, but she definitely has her moments! That's why after a day full of graham crackers and Mac n cheese I ask her if she wants a "pouch." The answer is almost always yes, and then I feel better about her nutrition. Other days she is good with vegetables, and fruit, but I have some Happy Tot in the pantry for those other times. She likes the sweet potato/apple/carrot one and the green bean/pear/pea the best, but there haven't been any that she seemed to hate.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Grainy Yuck
customer_reviews.text: We have been eating different brand of squeeze pouches in our house for almost 2 years. My daughter who eats next to nothing has at least one (if not 2 or 3) daily to get all the nutrients she needs. I have eaten all of the ones that have gone through pur house so I was surprised when she said yuck and spit these at me. But I agree with her. The texture is grainy and the flavors are terrible. I do not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnea Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good for baby and easy for you!
customer_reviews.text: Anything that is portable and easy is a great thing for a parent. My son will happily eat these pouches over 'real' food even though he is way past the age of needing pureed food. These come in real handy when you don't want to give a messy snack that is unhealthy as well. The only downside, TSA is VERY inconsistent with the baby food allowance. Sometimes we have been allowed through with these with no problems. Other days (more often than not) we have either had to have each opened and tested or agree to the full body search (no thanks with a wily toddler).
customer_reviews.author: twinklehead

customer_reviews.title: Functional but not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: The food is functional. My child doesn't really care for the flavors compared to other brands but will eat it. It is handy to be able to buy a case with some variety of foods.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: My 8 month old loved all these flavors and continues to eat them now ...
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old loved all these flavors and continues to eat them now at 10 months. Apples or pears are the first ingredient in each one, so they are a little sugary, but at least it's all good, real food. The apple, carrot, pumpkin one is DELICIOUS - tastes like pumpkin pie.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah LaRose

customer_reviews.title: Great stage 4 pouches!
customer_reviews.text: Love the more complex ingredients in these pouches! They make me feel good about the nutrients he’s getting even when it’s an on the go snack. We’ll definitely be ordering these again!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Savory Squash Pouch
customer_reviews.text: This has a nice flavor and my wife and I like that it is organic and a pretty healthy on the go pouch option for part of a meal or snack when we're out and about with our daughter. If our daughter could rate it; we're pretty sure she would say she loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and oh so convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these at whole foods one day while running errands. Daughter seemed hungry and I knew I wouldn't be home for a bit so I gave these a try. My baby was 9 months at the time and she easily held and fed herself. From then on my daughter and I were hooked! I was loving the convenience and easy portability that young babies can eat these straight from the pouch. I love that its organic and the packaging is free of everything harmful. I now buy multiple flavors in bulk from amazon! So happy to have tried this food. A++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon81

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on-the-go snacks!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for on-the-go snacks/meals! I love that it is organic & healthy for my daughter to eat with the convienence of not having to hand mix her anything. She LOVES the taste and I will be buying these again in a subscription this time!
customer_reviews.author: Erin P.

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: These pouches are a bit pricey but if they get my 2 yr old boy to get some veggies in him, then it's worth it. Like most 2 yr olds, he is not a good eater when it comes to veggies. He doesn't love this flavor but will eat it. I think he just likes the packaging (pouch) to eat out of. I can tell there is a ton of sugar because he is bouncing off the walls after eating, so these are good as an occasional snack. Perfect for on the go or traveling. I will buy more, probably try a different flavor next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi B.

customer_reviews.title: My picky 1 year old will gladly eat these!
customer_reviews.text: I have an extremely picky 1 year old, but he has always loved squeeze packs. In an effort to get more veggies in him I decided to give these a try. He's not always up for these though and will say "other squeeze pack?" so I'll usually start him off with a fruit one. After that when he asks for a second squeeze pack I'll hand him this one and he usually eats it without objection. All in all I think my success rate is about 3 out of 5 tries (which is good for him). The price is right too.
customer_reviews.author: UGA girl

customer_reviews.title: Good Healthy Snack
customer_reviews.text: I love these pouches and so does my daughter. I love that they are all natural. It has been a good way to supplement veggies, if she won't eat them separately. She thinks it's a treat to get them and I feel good about giving them to her. I also like having the variety. I only wish they could be recycled.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S Preston

customer_reviews.title: My son gives these 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: My son's favorite version of these fruit squeezes. He calls them Gerbers, and always requests the "orange" gerber (the pic of mango on front). I've bought the more expensive version last time and he wasn't having it. Wanted these and that is fine by me! They are the cheapest of all the happytot versions and i'll be purchasing more in the future! I like that they have both vegetables and fruit in them and I never feel bad offering this as a snack during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahmac

customer_reviews.title: FOR THE MOM ON THE GO...
customer_reviews.text: I absoutly love these things!! And so does my 13 month old.. Perfect for when we are out and about and he gets hungry.. just pop the top open and my son will suck all the goodness out in a matter of minuites!! Then Put the cap back on and he will play with the pouch for quite a while, so dual purpose! Also when he doesnt feel good (which has been qutie a bit because of teething) he will have one of these with no fuss.. So when he wont eat anything else I as least know he is gettin something good in his tummy when he has one of these.
customer_reviews.author: onecutepugdickey

customer_reviews.title: Toddler disapproved.
customer_reviews.text: Normally my toddler loves it when I wave an applesauce or yogurt packet in front of him. He knows the difference between the good and bad now and he he will throw this one on the ground. I tried myself and yep, they’re gross. Big waste.
customer_reviews.author: TheBooey

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love Them
customer_reviews.text: My kids have been eating these for several years now. One of the only ways I can get veggies in them! Perfect for sending in the lunchbox to school.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethBBB

customer_reviews.title: Strange flavor?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s the chia but my daughter wouldn’t eat any of these, she normally loves all the happy tot
customer_reviews.author: K. George

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick snack
customer_reviews.text: Super easy and our little little lady seems to like the taste. Great for on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Brent H

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is a variety box! Perfect for little ones that want a little independent at dinner time without a huge mess. My son is 13 months and these are perfect for him. Organic ingredients and no junk. Also had a great expiration date so worried if close dated product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great on the go food!
customer_reviews.text: Our 20 month twins love these. They are very convenient and usually pretty neat! I called the company because our UPC # matched a voluntary recall number from January of 2010 and they were very helpful in explaining the three ways to tell that it was not from that batch (wagon wheel top, "Cheer Pack" on the back, and expiration that would expire no more than 15 months from May of 2010). Further more, they were confident that the voluntary recall got back all the products with faulty packaging. Very satisfied with this product and the flavor is good!
customer_reviews.author: Klee

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but odd flavors the baby doesn't care for
customer_reviews.text: Probably won't buy again. My 8 month old does not like these combinations very much. I have to squeeze them out and warm them up for him to eat them which defeats the purpose of convenient squeeze packs. Had to mix most of them with rice cereal to change the taste to get him to eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 4

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toddler snack!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these pouches! He loves the flavor and they are so easy to travel with they fit perfectly in his backpack. I love that they are a healthy snack that’s so portable!
customer_reviews.author: Justin and Heather

customer_reviews.title: I was spending a fortune every week buying these in ...
customer_reviews.text: I was spending a fortune every week buying these in the grocery store to get us through to the next week. Now that I have these on my subscribe and save, we are definitely saving $$$ and we have them for the whole month!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Giancola

customer_reviews.title: Kiddos LOVE these fruit and veggie blends-- brilliant way to get in extra nutrients at snack time!
customer_reviews.text: These organic pouches sell out FAST at the store, and with good reason! We love these fruit and veggie pouches-- they are portable, sized perfectly for kiddo hands, and offer a perfect, wholesome snack. Ingredients are organic and give a healthy dose of nutrients. All organic with 100% natural ingredients, no pesticides, no chemical fertilizers, no genetic modifications, and no preservatives. The pouches themselves are are BPA and phthalate free. Wonderful, healthy addition to your kiddo routine!
customer_reviews.author: sassymom

customer_reviews.title: Picky toddler approved
customer_reviews.text: Only healthy food my toddler will eat! He is super picky but put these in a bowl and give him a spoon and he'll eat em up. Thankful he will eat something healthy until this pickiness passes!
customer_reviews.author: mck

customer_reviews.title: Our grandson has loved eating these for years!
customer_reviews.text: We've been buying these pouches for our youngest grandson since he was about six months old. He's almost three years old now and still loves these and we love that they are portable, organic and there are a lot of flavors. It is a bit pricey yet it makes me feel so good to know he's getting so many healthy vitamins and from low-fat sources. We carry these in our car so that on the days we pick him up from daycare he can eat one right away while riding in his car seat.
customer_reviews.author: R. Klemetsen

customer_reviews.title: Happy Tot = Happy Tot
customer_reviews.text: Our 2.5 year old son loves anything in pouch form so we buy all of the Happy Tot Oraganic foods in large supply each month with our Subscribe & Save order. We can't keep too many in the house. Good on the go and great along with any meal or as a snack. As a parent, you can't be happier giving your kids all natural, organic fruits and vegetables. My wife and I would prefer if he would eat them in their whole form, but the greens are so important for growing bodies so for now we'll keep buying these.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Great combination and flavor
customer_reviews.text: My baby love this flavor! I am a big fan of mango and so happy my baby loves Mango too lol
customer_reviews.author: Yurie

customer_reviews.title: kids liked these when they were about 15-18 months old
customer_reviews.text: kids liked these when they were about 15-18 months old. But they are messy, create a bunch of waste, and recently reported to possibly contain heavy metals, so I stopped buying them.
customer_reviews.author: 5un5

customer_reviews.title: The chia is a wonderful protein/fiber source
customer_reviews.text: My toddler has a large number of food allergies, and we prefer to feed organic. The chia is a wonderful protein/fiber source. This is one of the rare foods that do not use wheat, corn, apple, sweet potato, avocado, or pork, beef, chicken or turkey, all of which are foods that trigger some nasty allergies. He loves the blueberries. The lids aren't as tough as other to remove. The size is a perfect amount at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Katreena

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Love baby pouches!! Best way to get in those fruit and veges and the kids love to feed themselves! The flavors are great.
customer_reviews.author: AsNmA

customer_reviews.title: These are a serious lifesaver for healthy food on the go!!!
customer_reviews.text: These pouches make being a mum SO much easier! We need all the help we can get, right?! My 18mo old loves this flavor (blueberries are her favorite fruit) and I LOVE that they are completely organic and non-gmo. Plus, no added sugar or weird ingredients. If your little one likes cold foods try putting them in the freezer and then after you've been out and about all day they turn into a slushy. Extra yum! I guess they could kinda double as an icepack too?
customer_reviews.author: ActionJem

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, organic and great variety
customer_reviews.text: My tot loves all 4 of these flavors. It’s a great variety and includes some much-needed veggies
customer_reviews.author: OrganicShopper

customer_reviews.title: Toddler approved.
customer_reviews.text: When my toddler was cutting molars all he would eat were pouches. He would usually refuse any that had vegetables in them, but these he loved.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Great food on the go, and the flavors are a hit. Gives the child some control of their food which is nice on long trips strapped down.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa V

customer_reviews.title: One of his favorites!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this blend. It is one of my 8 month old son's favorites. I wish it was a little greener, indicating more green beans and peas, but he loves it and I'm thrilled with that. His favorite meal I think is a pouch of Chick Chick and a pouch of this. As long he continues to love it, I will make sure to keep it stocked for him. Love it! I also love the convenience of this style of pouch since you can just squeeze it straight onto the spoon and save what you don't use for later.
customer_reviews.author: RCH

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, organic, nutritious!
customer_reviews.text: Nutritious and delicious! My three-and-one-half-year-old grandson will eat anything but straight vegetables from a pouch so I buy organic veg-fruit mixes for him in that form. I find it's so far the best way to be sure he'll have good nutrition for at least the day or two weekly he's at my house. I like the addition of this previously-unknown-to-me grain in place of the more typical wheat or oats, if grain is included.
customer_reviews.author: GypsyWeaver

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my LO. These are great. I'm happy with the flavors and my LO likes them too. Easy to use and store.
customer_reviews.author: Lj

customer_reviews.title: this is a good choice to take in the car and when out ...
customer_reviews.text: For babies and toddlers used to fresh, organic, homemade fare, this is a good choice to take in the car and when out and about for those sudden hungers when convenience is needed. My grandson loves to squeeze these into his mouth. Much better than crackers and junk food usually sold as snacks for babes.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: A little Weary
customer_reviews.text: BUT HE LOVES IT. My 5 month old LOVES these mixtures. I promised I would never feed him something that I wouldn't eat myself. They ALL taste good. I would eat any of them if I was so inclined to eat a pureed meal. They are easy to pack & throw in the diaper back/suit case for travel. I had no worry about them leaking (like a small plastic tupperware). The price is right, shipping was quick, and they store really well in the pantry in the ready made box. Happy Baby = Happy Mommy
customer_reviews.author: cariblue85

customer_reviews.title: NOT YUMMY
customer_reviews.text: I try these every time before feeding my daughter, and this one was NASTY. She nor I liked it. If i could semd it back I would. It was pretty disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my elderly mother who is on a puree diet and has dementia. She doesn't eat a lot and is really picky. She liked all of these. I was even able to add some protein powder to them and she didn't notice. Recommend for babies and adults!
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Only way I can get some veggies in!
customer_reviews.text: Insert picky 20 month old who is anti veggies and a frustrated mom who is willing to try anything. These really are a life saver when it comes time to making sure my daughter is getting in some type of veggie when she eats. She use to be a great eater but once the toddler stage came it all went down hill. Sure they are pricey but I know that she will always gobble this up when offered. We don't eat these everyday just a few times a week and Amazon has the best price!
customer_reviews.author: La la

customer_reviews.title: Best Pouches!
customer_reviews.text: I love Happy Baby and Happy Tot food pouches. They are a lifesaver! My son eats one every day, and I know he's getting good, healthy fruits and veggies. This brand is my favorite of the various pouches out there, because it also has antioxidants, omega 3s, as well as fiber and protein. So on those days when he doesn't eat as much (due to teething or whatever), I feel like he's still getting a lot of nutrition from this one pouch. We stock our pantry with them!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Mills

customer_reviews.title: Innovative, healthy and YUMMY!
customer_reviews.text: We love these HappyTots! The flavors are wonderful and the added Salba grain is a great way to add nutrients. My son is in Kindergarten and he asks to take these to school for snack time. The pear added to this combo is especially nice since it adds sweetness not found in the veggies - a very nice balance of flavor. Also, the convenience of the pouch is so great, I keep some in my bag, in my car and at the grandparent's house so I know a healthy snack is always available. Highly recommend trying this product and flavor if you are looking to add tasty nutrition to your child's diet.
customer_reviews.author: mojobear

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Happybaby Happy Tot line of fruit/veggie and salba pouches with Omega-3 DHA. These are great and my son loves them. I always have 1 in my diaper bag and love all the flavors, spinach, mango and pear, sweet potato, apple, butternut squash and pea I think. I am so glad to have a product like this for on the go and it is so easy for my son to do it by himself! Would love it if they were a little cheaper. I have been able to find them for $1 a piece at Taget, but that was a sale.
customer_reviews.author: Pirc_defense_expert

customer_reviews.title: Getting those fruits & veggies
customer_reviews.text: I keep these at work. Better than a breakfast bar about 10 o'clock and then I'm getting that extra dose of fruits & veggies. Keep some in the car to had out to homeless folks too.
customer_reviews.author: Nevada Quacker

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: For travelling, it is very easy. And delicious. My children like it, so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stone

product_meta.title: Happy Tot Organic Stage 4 Super Foods Variety Pack, 4.22 Ounce Pouch (Pack of 16) Green Beans/Pear/Pea, Sweet Potato/Apple/Carrot/Cinnamon, Apple/Butternut/Spinach/Mango/Pear (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Style:16 Count| Flavor:Super Food Variety| Size:4.22 Ounce (Pack of 16)At happy family, we aim to provide your little ones with the nutrition they need to grow and shine. Our happy tot pouches are organic fruit and vegetable mixes with salba. The super chia for added nutrients. Salba. The super chia is an ancient, gluten-free seed that is packed with goodness and helps to give our happy tot pouches important nutrients like omega-3s (ala) and fiber. Happy tot pouches are a perfect snack for a picky toddler.
feature_bullets: SUPER TASTY SUPERFOODS: Easily welcome superfoods into your tot’s diet, along with important nutrients. A blend of organic fruits, vegetables, and wholesome chia seeds offer omega-3s, fiber, and vitamin C to your growing (and sometimes picky!) eater.

STAGE FOUR EATERS: The most important aspect of food for the toddler years is the quality–the types of carbs, protein, and fat, as well as the vitamins and minerals, in the foods you feed your baby & Happy Tot's Stage 4 foods are great for picky eaters!

HAPPY TOT: Our toddler foods & toddler snacks are designed to provide your toddler with wholesome nourishment to help support development. Our organic yogurt, veggie bowls, toddler formula, multi-grain toddler snacks & more will keep your tot a Happy Tot.

MINDFULLY MADE: We develop premium organic recipes perfectly matched with your child's age and stage. Explore our snacks & meals for growing babies, toddlers & kids, from baby food pouches to freeze-dried yogurt treats, organic cereals & toddler snacks.

HAPPY TUMMIES: Try Happy Tot's full line of toddler smoothie pouches, organic toddler milk drink, whole milk yogurt, puffed grain snacks, and meal bowls if you've enjoyed products from MySuperSnacks, Annie's, Sprout, Veggie-Go's, Nosh or Nature's Bandits.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
